text: "Kiss from a Rose" is a 1994 song by British soul singer Seal and is the second single from his second studio album of the same name. The song was later re-released on the Batman Forever movie soundtrack in 1995. It topped the single charts in Australia and the United States and went to the top 10 in Austria, Canada, Denmark, France, Ireland, the Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, Switzerland and the United Kingdom. It also missed the top 10 in Belgium, Germany and New Zealand. It won for two Grammy Awards in 1996. == References == Category:1994 songs Category:Seal songs Category:Batman (1989 movie series)
title: Kiss from a Rose
